DOC.brief_summary: Data show episodes bleeding may often observe critically ill patient dialysis-dependent acute renal failure ( ARF ) renal replacement therapy ( RRT ) . From clinical perspective , patient dialysis-dependent ARF end-stage renal disease ( ESRD ) may consider high risk population regard e.g . development gastrointestinal ( GI- ) bleeding . In current prospective subanalysis `` SIREN '' randomize placebo-controlled clinical trial `` SUP-ICU '' ( NCT02467621 ) , investigator seek elucidate whether subpopulation critically ill patient dialysis-dependent acute renal failure benefit prophylactic treatment proton-pump-inhibitor pantoprazole .
